channel.title: YouTube Question

item.title: YouTube Question
item.dc:creator: Thezla
item.description:
Hello!
I’ve recently tried to monetize a video of me playing Black Mesa on Youtube. Is that okay? I got the message that I needed more proof if I would be allowed to do that. If I may, what should I respond? If I’m not allowed, please tell me.

// Thezla

Read full topic
